title: Hi Riot, please upload splash arts in 1080p
body:
Hello Riot, 
that new Riot Girl Tristana splash art looks really good and I would like to have it as my wallpaper.
Unfortunately you only uploaded it in 1215x717p, which looks really awful on my monitors.
Please at least upload future splash arts in 1080p, preferably even larger since downscaling doesn't affect the quality as much.
Thanks.

replies.body: you can use http://waifu2x.booru.pics/ to do a 2x upscale
Wow thanks alot, that actually works really well!
1080p refers to a video resolution. 1080 x 1920 is what you probably want, though monitors come in all kinds of sizes, so there are many more standard image resolutions than there are for video.
